general: The foundations of your life are beginning to transform, dear Aries. The Moon in Taurus influences your destiny, as do Mercury and Venus, prompting you to reflect on your identity and personal goals. With the arrival of Neptune in your sign, a fourteen-year cycle begins, promising profound evolution. It is essential to distinguish reality from illusion at this moment. This evening, when the Moon aligns with Jupiter, trust your intuition to make informed decisions.
love: Express your desires clearly to strengthen the bond.
work: Be bold in your professional choices; change is underway.
health: Take the time to recharge and meditate.
advice: Trust your instincts to move forward.
teaser: Transformations and intuition, a key day!
